title: Creating a serious Ranked team Silver-Gold Need all roles
body:
Hello there,
         My name is Dontae, but you can call me De. I am currently in the process of making a serious ranked team. I am in need of all roles. There will be required practice two times out of the week and after hearing everyone schedule there will be one day for just ranked for about 3 or 4 games, more if people have the time. Add me in game WhatsHisFace17 to talk to me. Or reply down here with your IGN.

replies.body: I can play any role Just message me for tryouts im on most of the night to be honest GodofVanity please add me

I can main any role I need to, but my most comfortable roles are Supp, mid, and Jg. I also have a wide pool of comfort picks for champions so I can adapt to what the team lacks. 
The only time my availability becomes sketchy is around 5pm, but other than that I'm free most likely. 
Is this team going to be ranked casual or are you planning on doing tournaments as well.
Mid main gold 3 LGT VII Enigma Large Champ Pool and tons of Team Exp
ADC main, silver 5 but i play with friends who are in high gold and i dont do terrible. Add me for more info

I support main, mid secondary. Add me in game or I will add you. Respond if interested

Champ Pool: Thresh, Bard, Alistar, Taric, Morg (in order of skill level)
Division/Rank: Silver 2 (Currently in promos for S1)
IGN: The Wild Dyr
Availability:** ALL ARE IN PST** | Mon, Tues, Thurs - 7:30-9:30 | Sat, Sun - Practically all day | Fri: 4:00-11:00 | Wed: Probably nothing :( |
Secondary Role: Mid
Champ Pool: Lulu, Zed, Karma

Thanks for reading!
i can play adc on my smurfs. but i know personally i cant do practice every day as i work at night.

hey i'm starting a discord community and would love to help you host your team! if your interested please add me in game 
IGN: Ninjab0rn
Jungler.  Can pretty much play anything, but comfort picks are tanks, like voli/gragas.

G2, main top, usually free in the afternoons from 5-8 EST and weekends.
